snippet.title: Deck of Ashes - Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description: Deck of Ashes is an adventure game with tactical and thoughtful card combat. Lead the cast of antiheroes on a quest for redemption. Explore the dark cursed fantasy world and hunt down powerful cards. Put your survival and resource management skills to the test when upgrading your Camp of allies. Forge a unique Battle Deck, and crush your foes! Can you rid the world of the Ash Curse?
